name: Prestidigitation
description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.
<bi> Sensory Effect. <r> You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.
<bi> Fire Play. <r> You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
<bi> Clean or Soil. <r> You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
<bi> Minor Sensation. <r> You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.
<bi> Magic Mark. <r> You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
<bi> Minor Creation. <r> You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.
